posts.post_content: A little tough to play in Limited, but you'd be hard pressed to find a bigger soldier. Not the card for everyone, and I don't think a lot of Soldier decks will be splashing green for it, but with a couple of buffs this is a body that you can't ignore.
posts.html:
A little tough to play in Limited, but you'd be hard pressed to find a bigger soldier. Not the card for everyone, and I don't think a lot of Soldier decks will be splashing green for it, but with a couple of buffs this is a body that you can't ignore.

posts.post_content: A little expensive, but useful if you want a sturdy ground defense and the Guardians of Akrasa aren't big enough. Only worth the mana in a soldier deck, though, since he can get a really substantial bonus from the smiths (potentially as high as +4/+4, though that would take a while) and Captain of the Watch (another potential +4/+4).
posts.html:
A little expensive, but useful if you want a sturdy ground defense and the Guardians of Akrasa aren't big enough. Only worth the mana in a soldier deck, though, since he can get a really substantial bonus from the smiths (potentially as high as +4/+4, though that would take a while) and Captain of the Watch (another potential +4/+4).
